instance_template: plan("BasicData"). plan("PremiumData"). phone("ModelX"). phone("ModelY"). accessory("CaseA"). accessory("CaseB").
generator: 1 { selected_plan(P) : plan(P) } 1. 1 { selected_phone(M) : phone(M) } 1. 1 { selected_accessory(A) : accessory(A) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: BasicData and ModelY just don't vibe together, sanity check this combo out of existence.
ModelX is super picky and won't roll without CaseA.
PremiumData and CaseA are a no-go, don't let them pair up.
